title: Genetics
description: Mendelian and molecular genetics: principles of inheritance, gene structure and function, foundations of recombinant DNA technology, genetic basis of variation and evolution.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ((BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D))
